page.title: 12Leisure in Sheerness
page.content: Sheppey{Leisure}Complex which was opened in 1984, is situated on the seafront in Sheerness and managed by Swale Borough Council. It is an impressive building separated, by a car park, from the{swimming pool}which was opened six years ago. Individuals and local{clubs}and organisations are all able to use the {recreation}facilities. Squash, Badminton, Tennis, Hockey and Gymnastics are some of the sports provided for. Weight training, solarium and sauna facilities are also available. A bar and spectators gallery attracts the whole family. The Leisure centre opens daily from 10 am to 11 pm. The Swimming Pool consisting of a large pool and a small learner pool is open daily from 9 am to 9 pm.
